channel.title: [Bug] Game crashing upon opening scripted tutorial or entering a game
channel.description:
#### What happened? My game crashes to desktop whenever I open the scripted tutorial or after I pick a name in an online game. Reinstalling has not fixed the problem.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The game should not crash when entering a game or the tutorial.
#### Steps to reproduce: Join a game or open the tutorial, and the game will crash after loading.
#### Comments: As I cannot upload attachments here, I could upload my crash files over discord (Wortho#3133) Here is a truncated version of my log, if it proves helpful. Could you explain to me what is going on here?
Unity Player [version: Unity 5.6.4p3_11e8f66cfca7]
ThroneOfLies.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005) in module ThroneOfLies.exe at 0023:013e37dc.
Error occurred at 2017-12-08_153726. E:\Steam\steamapps\common\Throne of Lies\ThroneOfLies.exe, run by [me]. 60% memory in use. 0 MB physical memory [3232 MB free]. 0 MB paging file [0 MB free]. 0 MB user address space [3203 MB free]. Read from location 00000177 caused an access violation.
error.txt https://pastebin.com/mhGPV2Te
output_log.txt https://pastebin.com/iq46nXK9

item.title: [Bug] Game crashing upon opening scripted tutorial or entering a game
item.dc:creator: Wortho27
item.description:
What happened?

My game crashes to desktop whenever I open the scripted tutorial or after I pick a name in an online game. Reinstalling has not fixed the problem.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The game should not crash when entering a game or the tutorial.

Steps to reproduce:

Join a game or open the tutorial, and the game will crash after loading.

Comments:

As I cannot upload attachments here, I could upload my crash files over discord (Wortho#3133)
Here is a truncated version of my log, if it proves helpful. Could you explain to me what is going on here?

Unity Player [version: Unity 5.6.4p3_11e8f66cfca7]

ThroneOfLies.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
in module ThroneOfLies.exe at 0023:013e37dc.

Error occurred at 2017-12-08_153726.
E:\Steam\steamapps\common\Throne of Lies\ThroneOfLies.exe, run by [me].
60% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [3232 MB free].
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].
0 MB user address space [3203 MB free].
Read from location 00000177 caused an access violation.

error.txt
https://pastebin.com/mhGPV2Te

output_log.txt
https://pastebin.com/iq46nXK9

Read full topic
